tool_description: Loads traditional prayer collections and timing guidelines for various spiritual traditions.

tradition.description: Spiritual tradition: christian, islamic, jewish, buddhist, hindu, secular_meditation

denomination.description: Specific denomination or branch within tradition

prayer_type.description: Type of prayers: liturgical, contemplative, devotional, meditative, all

error_messages: Unsupported tradition: Use one of [christian, islamic, jewish, buddhist, hindu, secular_meditation]
Unknown denomination: The specified denomination is not recognized for this tradition
Invalid prayer type: Use one of [liturgical, contemplative, devotional, meditative, all]
usage: Specify the spiritual tradition and optionally narrow by denomination and prayer type. Returns traditional prayers with timing guidelines.

tradition_name.description: Name of the loaded spiritual tradition

recommended_times.description: Array of recommended times for each prayer

durations_minutes.description: Array of typical durations in minutes for each prayer
